knowledge_zone.heading: Paradox: Creates meaning in the text

sections.content: Paradox is used throughout the text to creates meaning in the text.

examples.scene: Opening description of astronauts' shared isolation
examples.effect: Captures contradictory nature of human connection in cosmic isolation, enabling philosophical contemplation of existence

pedagogy_zone.heading: From Device Spotting to Analysis
pedagogy_zone.intro_text: Most students can identify a device. Strong analysis shows what it DOES. Don't just label it—explain its function in creating meaning.

content.question: Ask yourself: Why does the author use Paradox HERE? What meaning does it create in this specific moment?
content.framework: Use TVODE: Technique → Verb → Observation → Device effect → Evaluation

pedagogy_zone.essay_application: In your essays, always connect device to meaning. Show HOW the technique creates the effect, don't just identify that it's there.
